Articles.Content:
Since it's been asked so much, the wrong license was purchased and this version does not have active CMS features like User Blogs. The upgrade license should get purchased next week and we'll upgrade.

-DR

Since it's been asked so much, the wrong license was purchased and this version does not have active CMS features like User Blogs. The upgrade license should get purchased next week and we'll upgrade.

-DR

Sweet Kerbals covered in Honey. That is seriously great news!

Love the fact that the Dev Blogs are on the right in the main forums view!

Good work

https://www.vbulletin.com/index.php?do=features

Whoa, those are a lot of features for the upgrade!

On another note, there should also be backwards compatibility with the old SM thread/post querying (like the link to a PHP that gets a thread and then returns the thread... sigh, like THESE kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=14066.75) since all of those links take me to the index, which is very inconvenient for everyone. There are still links that use it and Google for sure still uses those links and has not found out that we've moved to VB.
Waiting for NovaSilisko to start a planet blog. Can't wait for 0.17!
Heh, I was just looking for his blog. Looking at the 0.17 general discussion thread he seems to be too busy playing KSP with his new planets to write about them

Am I the only one who thinks there should be some extra rules for posting blogs? AKA how much content they have to have at least?

Some of them feel like off-topic and/or spam posts to me...
